doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Rasheda Samad is a highly respected newborn, adolescent, and child diseases specialist in Chattogram. Prof. Dr. Rasheda Samad currently serves as a Professor of Pediatrics at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. doctor.name: Dr. Abir Das
doctor.info: Dr. Abir Das is a highly qualified and experienced newborn and child specialist in Chittagong, dedicated to providing top-notch pediatric care. With an MBBS degree, BCS (Health), MCPS (Paediatrics), and FCPS (Paediatrics), he has gained extensive expertise in treating various childhood diseases. As a former Junior Consultant at Chittagong Medical College Hospital, Dr. Abir Das has successfully managed numerous cases of neonatal jaundice, respiratory infections, asthma, pneumonia, malnutrition, and growth-related disorders. He is available for consultation at Woodland Diagnostic Center, located at 37, KB Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chittagong, where he attends patients from 7 PM to 9 PM, except on Thursdays and Fridays. Parents looking for expert pediatric care can visit his chamber to ensure their child’s optimal health and development.

chamber.address: 37, KB Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chittagong
